item.title: Retrieving Lexile Levels in R
item.description: For those that don't work in education or aren't aware, there is a measurement for a child's reading level called a Lexile Â® Level.  There are ways in which this level can be retrieved using different reading assessments.  The measurement can be used to match a child's reading level to books that are the same level.  So the company maintains a database of books that they have assigned levels.  There are other assessments that measure how well a child is reading, but I'm not aware of any systems that assign books as comprehensively.
